title: Object - Equity Compensation Transfer Transaction
description: Object describing a transfer of equity compensation

object_type.description: This is done to avoid a breaking change as we work towards a bigger restructure of the equity types in v2.0.0. `TX_PLAN_SECURITY_TRANSFER` will be deprecated in v2.0.0

quantity.description: Quantity of non-monetary security units transferred
